name: pothos
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an evergreen plant (= one that never loses its leaves), often with variegated leaves (= that have patterns of different colours). It is often grown in a container: Golden pothos is the all-time low-maintenance vine. Researchers found that pot plants, such as spider plants and pothos, reduced pollution in offices.
More examplesFewer examplesThe pothos looked well.Pothos are easy to look after.Along the top of the cubicle walls were ivy-like plants that he recognized as pothos.
